opening_theme: "Hitoribocchi no Monologue (ひとりぼっちのモノローグ)" by Hitori Bocchi (Chisaki Morishita), Sunao Nako (Minami Tanaka), Honshou Aru (Akari Kito), Sotca Luckythar (Yuuko Kurose)
